HATEOAS is starting to appear everywhere....

Maybe it's just me but I think that the term HATEOAS is detrimental in  
at least two ways. It has the negative connotation of having HATE  
inside it and also covers what is one of the most important aspects of  
REST 'hypermedia'.

I therefore make the serious proposal to burry HATEOAS and actively  
use 'hypermedia constraint' instead before its too late.

Any supporters?

Jan
